posts.post_title: T205's For Sale - Girlie Man Fromme Reduced!
posts.post_content:
A couple of doubles I'm looking to sell.  Price is $30 each or $55 for the pair.  Price includes postage and insurance.  Paypal (gift), money orders and checks accepted.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url] .

Michael Doolan - Philadelphia Phillies - Polar Bear

Arthur Fromme - Cincinnati Reds - Sweet Caporal
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=135&pictureid=2803[/IMG]

Thanks!

Kevin
